tosdr.tldr: Microsoft sites use cookies on your computer. This gives Microsoft various forms of information about you, your preferences and behaviour. You can choose to reject all cookies in your browser but this may prevent you from using Microsoft services that require you to sign in. To track you on other Microsoft sites and across the web, Microsoft may also use web beacons that act in a similar way to cookies and gather and contain information about your web browsing behaviour.
